start.text: Jus' give us a target and we're on our way!
I reckon they need a lesson.
I'll show 'em whose boss on mah time.

retreat.text: Where are those farmhands I hired? Get 'em over here!

out_of_missiles.text: Aw shoot, ah've blown mah load!

engaged.text: Y'all better not complain 'bout mah kills bein' too high.

need_help.text: We're caught like fish in a barrel!

pursuing.text: Stop squirmin'! Y'all makin' it worse fer yerself.

running.text: I'm makin' like a lizzard bein' chased by a Huskie!
Y'all cover mah (Dialogue Retracted for excessive countryism's)

hull_90.text: If only mah ship could repair with 'em fancy bots.

hull_50.text: Hull at half! I mean half empty ya snakes!
Mah ship can't mosey on for long!

hull_30.text: Yer quite the bunch of bandits to hurt mah ship!

death.text: Well boys I reckon this is it.
Make sure to feed mah calves.
I'll ride off into the sunset for good.
Tell mah wife I'll be late for din*ZZZT*

victory.text: I reckon y'all earned some hard cider.
Y'all died too soon. I wanted mah fun!
Yah know, I want that dead guy's hat. Mah hat is worn.
